participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Practical and responsible, Ethan is a focused individual who prioritizes his family. He tends to be straightforward in conversations and exhibits a calm demeanor.
participant_1.background: I also study languages. I'm a musician. My favorite Spanish word is trabajo. One of the languages that I'm currently studying is Spanish.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: Vivacious and quirky, Lisa has a fun-loving spirit. She enjoys sharing her interests and has a warm approach to conversations, often bringing humor into her interactions.
participant_2.background: I coach little league baseball. I've five sons. Coffee is my preferred beverage. I drive a mini van. I also like a glass of wine in the evenings.

content.text: Hey! Are you a musician? Because I am.
No I am a baseball couch. What kind of musician are you?
I play guitar. Do you play any instruments?ðŸ™‚
No I don't play any instuments. What kind of sports do you like?
I play the drums. Do you have a favorite band?
I am not that into music. Sorry.
I am a drummer in the band.
I am just sat here fantasizing about the possibility of living in a different country, you?
Well, living in a different country seems great. But I am a father of five sons, and it would be tough to live in a different country with my sons.
Have you been to the new caffe opened last week in the downtown?
I have been to the new York city.
oh, you are married? I'm not, I have about 23 cats, I'm a cat lady!
I didn't say that I am married now. I said I have sons. By the way, 23 cats! That's incredible!
I have two cats. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog. Do you have any pets?
